phrs.translation: 绞痛, 腹绞痛, 急腹痛
肾绞痛, 翻译, 肾石痛
胆绞痛, 翻译, 胆石绞痛
肠绞痛, 肠疝痛, 肠疝病

sentences.sentence: Colic is almost always gone in four months.
sentences.translation: 疝气总是在四个月内就几乎消失殆尽。

sentences.sentence: The pain, termed renal colic, was my body straining to expel it.
sentences.translation: 我感觉到的疼痛，学名叫做肾绞痛，就是我的身体竭力排除结石的反应。

sentences.sentence: Big Ben also had two really bad attacks of colic and unlike most horses, Ben made it through.
sentences.translation: 大本曾经有两次很严重的急腹痛，不像大多数的马那样，他挺过来了。
